A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
One of the most divisise yet\, best film to date. They are now trying to tell their own story instead of trying to relive the trilogy yet again\, and it's pissing a lot of people off. 

Ryan Johson is trying to give out a clear message in this movie\, and it is best explained by Kylo Ren himself. 

"Let the past die\, kill it\, if you have to" 

It resumes the story perfectly and where Star Wars needs to go to continue for generations to come.
